Class AbstractOptionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yahoo.labs.samoa.moa.AbstractMOAObject
      • com.yahoo.labs.samoa.moa.options.AbstractOptionHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.github.javacliparser.Configurable, MOAObject, OptionHandler, Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractChangeDetector, AbstractClassifier, AbstractClusterer, ArffFileStream, BinaryTreeNumericAttributeClassObserver, BinaryTreeNumericAttributeClassObserverRegression, ClusteringStream, FileStream, GaussianNumericAttributeClassObserver, GiniSplitCriterion, GreenwaldKhannaNumericAttributeClassObserver, HyperplaneGenerator, InfoGainSplitCriterion, NominalAttributeClassObserver, NullAttributeClassObserver, RandomTreeGenerator, VarianceReductionSplitCriterion, VFMLNumericAttributeClassObserver

    public abstract class AbstractOptionHandler
extends AbstractMOAObject
implements OptionHandler
    Abstract Option Handler. All classes that have options in MOA extend this class.
    Version:
    $Revision: 7 $
    Author:
    Richard Kirkby (rkirkby@cs.waikato.ac.nz)
